properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used for signing JWT tokens for authentication and authorization

properties.name: jwt.expirationMilliSecond
properties.description: Expiration time (in milliseconds) for JWT tokens

properties.name: spring.datasource.users.url
properties.description: JDBC URL for connecting to the users database

properties.name: spring.datasource.users.username
properties.description: Username for authenticating to the users database

properties.name: spring.datasource.users.password
properties.description: Password for authenticating to the users database

properties.name: spring.datasource.users.driver-class-name
properties.description: JDBC driver class name for the users database connection

properties.name: spring.datasource.restaurant.url
properties.description: JDBC URL for connecting to the restaurant database

properties.name: spring.datasource.restaurant.username
properties.description: Username for authenticating to the restaurant database

properties.name: spring.datasource.restaurant.password
properties.description: Password for authenticating to the restaurant database

properties.name: spring.datasource.restaurant.driver-class-name
properties.description: JDBC driver class name for the restaurant database connection

properties.name: spring.report.bill-image.width
properties.description: Width (in pixels) of the bill image generated in reports

properties.name: spring.report.bill-image.template-name
properties.description: Template file name used for rendering bill images in reports
